name: pnp-list-formatting-document-library-thumbnails
title: Document Library Thumbnails
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates showing files in a document libary as preview images.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates showing files in a document libary as preview images.

metadata.value: ms-bgColor-themePrimary--hover, ms-bgColor-themeLighterAlt, ms-borderColor-neutralLight, ms-fontColor-neutralSecondary, ms-fontColor-white--hover, ms-fontWeight-regular, ms-fontSize-m

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
